mapper.sql: u.id as id , u.disabled as disabled , u.uuid as uuid , u.create_user as createUser , u.create_time as createTime , u.update_user as updateUser , u.update_time as updateTime , u.remark as remark , u.order_by as orderBy , u.title as title , u.memo as memo , u.summary as summary , u.flag as flag , u.exp_company as expCompany , u.is_push as isPush , u.is_app as isApp , u.category_id as categoryId , u.publish_time as publishTime
mapper.select:
select
from FAT_GOODS u where u.disabled = 0
select count(u.id) from FAT_GOODS u where u.disabled = 0

select count(u.id) from FAT_GOODS u where u.disabled = 0
AND ${whereSqlStr}

select
from FAT_GOODS u where u.disabled = 0 and u.ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

select
from FAT_GOODS u where u.disabled = 0 and u.uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from FAT_GOODS u where u.disabled = 0
mapper.insert: insert into FAT_GOODS( disabled, uuid, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark, order_by, title, memo, summary, flag, exp_company, is_push, is_app, category_id, publish_time )values( #{disabled,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPush,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{isApp,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into FAT_GOODS( disabled, uuid, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark, order_by, title, memo, summary, flag, exp_company, is_push, is_app, category_id, publish_time )values
( #{obj.disabled,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{obj.updateUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{obj.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.orderBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.expCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.isPush,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.isApp,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.categoryId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
